overview: In the sequel to the movie Stolen Kiss, tension mounts as the good for nothing older brother of the Umejesi family, Dan (Van Vicker) fights tooth and nail against his younger brother Victor (Jim Iyke) over the will. Now Victor must take the most unbelievable action to uphold peace in the family hence taking us to a different and more interesting and suspenseful angle of the whole story.
title: Stolen Will
